name: Flow Water Fountain 3D Puzzle
description:
Flow Water Fountain is a puzzle game of increasing difficulty in which each level is a challenging game of intelligence that will hook you.

Train your mind, solve the different puzzles by making the water flow from its origin to the color fountains forming different waterfalls. Create water cascades, move the different stones, channels and pipes through the 3D board and get the water of each color to flow and find the way to your destination source.

Flow Water Fountain contains 400 levels with increasing difficulty divided into several packs: Easy, Hard, Mix, Master, Genius and Maniac.

The game is suitable for fans of puzzles, games to train the mind and logic.

Characteristics:
- 250 free levels
- Without time limit.
- Boards of different sizes.

Download it now and start having fun!
